message:
Theme: Responsibility


Topic: Check your seed!

Text: II Corinthians 9:6; Galatians 6:7, 8; Proverbs 18:21; Matthew 7:16; Like 6:43,44; I Corinthians 12:26.


The quality of the harvest is the reflection of the quality of the seed.


## Two factors that determine your harvest; 


  1. 1. The quality of the seed.
  2. 2. The ecosystem in which the seed is planted. (Spiritual Ecosystem).


# Text to firstðŸ¥‡factor; 

* watch what comes out of you, from your words and actions.


Ephesians 4:29; Galatians 5:19-21, 22,23


# Text to secondðŸ¥ˆfactor; 


* The next time you are sowing the seed in the life of someone else, pray that the source will not be denied when the result comes out. 


*** Instructions can be seeded.

***God gives seed to the shower and also bread to the eaters.


'Bread eaters don't go far, only sowers of seed that go far
